comment: This module parses a XML Document into a XML DOM Document representation.

name: loadXMLStream
description: Loads and parses XML from a stream specified by stream, and returns a PDocument

name: loadXML
description: Loads and parses XML from a string specified by xml, and returns a PDocument

name: loadXMLFile
description: Loads and parses XML from a file specified by path, and returns a PDocument
